help-file.title: PASSWORD
help-file.content: The "password" option, seen at the entry menu, allows you to change your character's password. Players should make it a rule to change their passwords often to avoid the unpleasantness of having someone else gain control of their character. It is the players' responsibility to safeguard themselves by ensuring that they use a different password on each MUD they log into. Gods are *not* responsible for any "hacked" or "stolen" characters.
